body: Confirmed on Ubuntu 22.04. Reproducing is exactly as described by @Jelmerro: run quick-start, e.g. in fiddle, and `SIGTRAP` appears immediately. The regression appeared between -beta.8 and -beta.9.

https://github.com/electron/electron/compare/v20.0.0-beta.8...v20.0.0-beta.9

It's probably the 104.0.5112.39 bump at db0830e0f8d4aaffde0944aaee0983ec34f35c1a but I'll do some testing to confirm.

rename.from: [Bug]: SIGTRAP on start of any electron app above specific electron beta version

body:
@ckerr @Jelmerro Sorry both, could I ask you what desktop environment you're both using? Here's the pattern I'm seeing on repro:

* Ubuntu 20.04, Wayland: Does not SIGTRAP
* Ubuntu 20.04, Xorg: Does not SIGTRAP
* Ubuntu 20.04, Unity: Does not SIGTRAP
* Ubuntu 22.04, Wayland: Does not SIGTRAP
* Ubuntu 22.04, Xorg: SIGTRAP
* Ubuntu 22.04, Unity: SIGTRAP

I wonder if this could be a Unity and/or Xorg bug? Or perhaps we're checking for the existence of something on Wayland that doesn't exist on Unity/Xorg?
Cinnamon here, so that would be Xorg, but other computers that run the same operating system and desktop environment *do* work with the new beta releases, as I run the same system on most devices.

I noticed something similar when trying to reproduce on Ubuntu 20.04 - I canâ€™t repro at all on my Ubuntu 20.04 machine, regardless of environment. But @TGWKE could hit the SIGTRAP on Ubuntu 20.04, on every environment except Wayland. ðŸ¤”

> I wonder if this could be a Unity and/or Xorg bug?

Does this need the https://github.com/electron/electron/labels/x11 label or could this be because of any other protocol?

> @ckerr @Jelmerro Sorry both, could I ask you what desktop environment you're both using?

Great question; I should've included that info in my previous comment. I'm seeing this in 22.04 with Xorg.

issue.title: fix: crash on startup in X11

repository.name: electron
repository.description: :electron: Build cross-platform desktop apps with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS

issue.body:
#### Description of Change

Fixes #34996.

This is a regression introduced in 20.0.0-beta.9 caused by `ElectronBrowserMainParts::PreCreateThreads()` creating the main window before loading the locale resource bundle, but `ui::BuildDisplaysFromXRandRInfo()` needed that locale info to be loaded.

CC @electron/wg-releases 

#### Checklist

- [x] PR description included and stakeholders cc'd
- [ ] `npm test` passes
- [ ] tests are [changed or added](https://github.com/electron/electron/blob/main/docs/development/testing.md)
- [ ] relevant documentation is changed or added
- [x] [PR release notes](https://github.com/electron/clerk/blob/master/README.md) describe the change in a way relevant to app developers, and are [capitalized, punctuated, and past tense](https://github.com/electron/clerk/blob/master/README.md#examples).

#### Release Notes

Notes: Fix 20.0.0-beta.8 X11 crash regression.
